title: s3: SignatureDoesNotMatch for objects with spaces in the name with Ceph
body:
#### What is the problem you are having with rclone? When syncing an S3 bucket which contains objects with spaces in their names, a SignatureDoesNotMatch error is shown when those files are attempted to be synced. #### What is your rclone version (eg output from `rclone -V`) Tried both the lastest stable and the latest beta: 
# rclone -V
rclone v1.39
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.9.2

# rclone -V
rclone v1.39-207-g01753329β
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.10
Also tried v1.38, which had the same issue. #### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit) 
# uname -a
Linux backup01 4.10.0-28-generic #32~16.04.2-Ubuntu SMP Thu Jul 20 10:19:48 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

# lsb_release -a
No LSB modules are available.
Distributor ID:	Ubuntu
Description:	Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
Release:	16.04
Codename:	xenial
#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive) S3 (Ceph) #### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`) #### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`) Bucket containing a file both with and without spaces: 
# rclone tree MYS3:rclone-issue/ 
/
├── filename with spaces
└── filenamewithoutspaces

0 directories, 2 files

# rclone -vv sync MYS3:rclone-issue/ /tmp/rclone-issue/
2018/03/07 11:14:56 DEBUG : Using config file from "/root/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2018/03/07 11:14:56 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.39" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "sync" "MYS3:rclone-issue/" "/tmp/rclone-issue/"]
2018/03/07 11:14:56 DEBUG : MYS3: Using v2 auth
2018/03/07 11:14:56 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Modify window is 1ns
2018/03/07 11:14:56 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Waiting for checks to finish
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : filename with spaces: Failed to copy: failed to open source object: SignatureDoesNotMatch: 
	status code: 403, request id: tx000000000000000fc3b42-005a9fbba0-cfaefbb-default, host id: 
2018/03/07 11:14:56 DEBUG : filenamewithoutspaces: Size and modification time the same (differ by 0s, within tolerance 1ns)
2018/03/07 11:14:56 DEBUG : filenamewithoutspaces: Unchanged skipping
2018/03/07 11:14:56 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Waiting for transfers to finish
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: not deleting files as there were IO errors
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: not deleting directories as there were IO errors
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 1 errors and: failed to open source object: SignatureDoesNotMatch: 
	status code: 403, request id: tx000000000000000fc3b42-005a9fbba0-cfaefbb-default, host id: 
2018/03/07 11:14:56 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Waiting for checks to finish
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : filename with spaces: Failed to copy: failed to open source object: SignatureDoesNotMatch: 
	status code: 403, request id: tx000000000000001599992-005a9fbba0-c6ecac4-default, host id: 
2018/03/07 11:14:56 DEBUG : filenamewithoutspaces: Size and modification time the same (differ by 0s, within tolerance 1ns)
2018/03/07 11:14:56 DEBUG : filenamewithoutspaces: Unchanged skipping
2018/03/07 11:14:56 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Waiting for transfers to finish
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: not deleting files as there were IO errors
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: not deleting directories as there were IO errors
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 1 errors and: failed to open source object: SignatureDoesNotMatch: 
	status code: 403, request id: tx000000000000001599992-005a9fbba0-c6ecac4-default, host id: 
2018/03/07 11:14:56 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Waiting for checks to finish
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : filename with spaces: Failed to copy: failed to open source object: SignatureDoesNotMatch: 
	status code: 403, request id: tx000000000000000fc3b45-005a9fbba0-cfaefbb-default, host id: 
2018/03/07 11:14:56 DEBUG : filenamewithoutspaces: Size and modification time the same (differ by 0s, within tolerance 1ns)
2018/03/07 11:14:56 DEBUG : filenamewithoutspaces: Unchanged skipping
2018/03/07 11:14:56 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Waiting for transfers to finish
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: not deleting files as there were IO errors
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: not deleting directories as there were IO errors
2018/03/07 11:14:56 ERROR : Attempt 3/3 failed with 1 errors and: failed to open source object: SignatureDoesNotMatch: 
	status code: 403, request id: tx000000000000000fc3b45-005a9fbba0-cfaefbb-default, host id: 
2018/03/07 11:14:56 Failed to sync: failed to open source object: SignatureDoesNotMatch: 
	status code: 403, request id: tx000000000000000fc3b45-005a9fbba0-cfaefbb-default, host id:
After removing the object with spaces in the name all goes fine: 
# rclone tree MYS3:rclone-issue/ 
/
└── filenamewithoutspaces

0 directories, 1 files

# rclone -vv sync MYS3:rclone-issue/ /tmp/rclone-issue/
2018/03/07 11:15:44 DEBUG : Using config file from "/root/.config/rclone/rclone.conf"
2018/03/07 11:15:44 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.39" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "sync" "MYS3:rclone-issue/" "/tmp/rclone-issue/"]
2018/03/07 11:15:44 DEBUG : MYS3: Using v2 auth
2018/03/07 11:15:44 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Modify window is 1ns
2018/03/07 11:15:44 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Waiting for checks to finish
2018/03/07 11:15:44 DEBUG : filenamewithoutspaces: Size and modification time the same (differ by 0s, within tolerance 1ns)
2018/03/07 11:15:44 DEBUG : filenamewithoutspaces: Unchanged skipping
2018/03/07 11:15:44 INFO  : Local file system at /tmp/rclone-issue: Waiting for transfers to finish
2018/03/07 11:15:44 INFO  : Waiting for deletions to finish
2018/03/07 11:15:44 INFO  : 
Transferred:      0 Bytes (0 Bytes/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 1
Transferred:            0
Elapsed time:          0s

2018/03/07 11:15:44 DEBUG : Go routines at exit 5
2018/03/07 11:15:44 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.39" finishing with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "sync" "MYS3:rclone-issue/" "/tmp/rclone-issue/"]
Both objects were identical, apart from the name.
